Question: THEDAY1LAB Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TheDay1Lab

Product 1

- Nanocellulose production technology from spent malt
- Upcycles spent malt into nanocellulose, a natural high-value material
- Reduces paper pulp required by up to 15% when added at 1% by mass
Summary_cn:
第一天实验室

产品 1

- 从废弃的麦芽中提取纳米纤维素生产技术
- 将废弃的麦芽转化为纳米纤维素，一种天然的高价值材料
- 在质量比为 1% 时，将纳米纤维素添加到纸浆中可将所需纸浆量减少多达 15%
